intro.workTypes: 接受全职、自由职业与合同
intro.location: 目前位于英国 - 愿意搬迁
intro.name: Yash Kapure
intro.title: Hire Frontend Developer | React & Next.js.
intro.tagline: 具有全栈专业知识的前端工程师
intro.description: 我使用 React.js、Next.js、Tailwind CSS 和 shadcn/ui 构建快速、可访问且对 SEO 友好的 Web 应用程序。拥有 4 年以上的经验和强大的 JavaScript 和 TypeScript 全栈技能，我热衷于创建流畅的用户界面、保持出色的 UI/UX 并编写干净、可维护的代码。我打造现代用户体验，同时在需要时提供可扩展的后端集成。

services.heading: 我提供的服务
services.content: 我能为您构建什么 - 从 UI、API 到后端与数据。
services.seoLine: 前端与全栈服务：前端、全栈、数据库、性能、架构、产品 UI、SEO/AEO/GEO。Yash Kapure 提供的服务。

frontend.title: 前端开发
frontend.description: 使用 React、Next.js 或 Vue 构建快速、无障碍的用户界面。我实现第三方 API、复杂 API 集成以及支付网关（Stripe、Easebuzz），让您的前端与服务和支付无缝对接。

fullstack.title: 全栈开发
fullstack.description: 使用 MERN（MongoDB、Express、React、Node）、React + Node 或 MEVN 构建端到端 Web 应用。从认证与 API 到仪表盘与实时功能。

database.title: 数据库与后端
database.description: 为可扩展应用提供 schema 设计、查询与集成。SQL、NoSQL 及 Supabase 等托管后端，用于认证与实时。

performance.title: 性能与前端优化
performance.description: 让现有前端更快、更可靠。Core Web Vitals、打包体积与运行时性能，实现响应式 UI 与可预期的基础设施成本。

architecture.title: 前端架构与系统设计
architecture.description: 梳理前端代码结构，便于团队有序交付。组件边界、状态策略与清晰契约，保障安全重构。

productUi.title: 以产品为导向的 UI 工程
productUi.description: 将 Figma 与产品规格落地为生产级 UI。无障碍组件与设计系统对齐，确保交付结果对所有人可用。

seoAeo.title: SEO、AEO、GEO 与生产就绪
seoAeo.description: 为搜索、回答引擎与真实用户做好准备。元数据、结构化数据（SEO/AEO/GEO）、分析与监控，便于被发现、被 AI 引用并及早修复问题。

googleBusiness.title: Google 商家档案设置
googleBusiness.description: 让您的业务出现在 Google 地图和搜索中。我帮助设置和优化您的 Google 商家档案（分类、NAP、照片、帖子和评价），便于本地客户找到您。

about.heading: 关于我
about.paragraph1: 我的名字是 Yash Kapure，我是一名前端工程师，拥有 4 年以上的实际经验，设计快速、可用且对 SEO 友好的 Web 应用程序。我的专长是使用 React.js、Next.js、Tailwind CSS 和 shadcn/ui 制作流畅的用户界面，并使用 Framer Motion 让事物变得生动。
about.paragraph2: 除了我的前端经验，我还拥有良好的 JavaScript 和 TypeScript 全栈技能，以及 Node.js、Express 和 MongoDB 和 MySQL 等数据库的熟悉经验。这使我能够从头到尾管理项目，从设计流畅的用户界面到连接可扩展的后端。
about.paragraph3: 我为产品公司、诊所和初创公司构建了软件，通过精确的工程提供最大的性能、参与度和潜在客户捕获。编写优雅、最新的代码并发现新工具和趋势让我兴奋。
about.paragraph4: 工作之余，我喜欢板球和一杯好茶，但现在我已经习惯喝咖啡了。我总是愿意学习、实验和成长，并寻找机会为有影响力的产品和创新团队带来价值。

projects.heading: 我的项目
projects.content: 我参与的项目。每个项目都包含自己的案例研究。

calmLlama.title: Calm Llama - AI Chatbot
calmLlama.description: A modern web platform that enables users to discover and book premium wellness experiences such as saunas, yoga, massages, and float tanks. Features include real-time availability, secure payments, and instant booking confirmations. Worked as a Full Stack Freelance developer @ ToraTec AI, Dublin, Ireland

miniOtio.title: Mini Otio - AI Research Assistant
miniOtio.description: A modern AI-powered research assistant that combines real-time web search with intelligent response generation. Users can ask research questions and receive comprehensive, streamed responses with multiple formatting options (step-by-step, bullet points, ELI5). Features include bookmark management, conversation export, and a sleek chat interface with real-time streaming capabilities.

ec2Analyzer.title: EC2 Cloud Cost Analyzer
ec2Analyzer.description: AWS EC2 Cloud Cost Analyzer is a tool that helps you analyze the cost of your AWS EC2 instances. It is a web application that allows you to view the cost of your AWS EC2 instances and compare them with the cost of other AWS EC2 instances.

oias.title: Online Interview Assessment System (OIAS)
oias.description: A fully Functional Online Interview Assessment System for Students and Professionals. This comprehensive platform enables real-time video interviews, automated assessments, and seamless communication between interviewers and candidates.

dragonSino.title: Dragon Sino Group
dragonSino.description: Worked as a Full Stack developer at Dragon Sino Group. Created a fully functional MERN Stack Web Application with responsive behavior, smooth touch UI, and API Integration. This is a Chinese Company, working in the United Kingdom.

netflixClone.title: Netflix Clone using ReactJs
netflixClone.description: I created a Netflix clone using ReactJs and Sass. This is a clone of Netflix website. And played a lot with Api.

shangrila.title: Shangrila Petition Platform
shangrila.description: A fully Functional MERN Stack Web Application. Having responsive behaviour, smooth touch UI with API Integration. With Admin and Petitioner Panel, along with new features such as Login in with QR Code, Signing In, Setting Global Threshold.

earthly.title: Earthly Internship
earthly.description: Worked as an Intern at Earthly. A simple frontend project for Earthly.

kolorado.title: The Kolorado Paints
kolorado.description: A fully Functional Next.js Based Frontend along with MERN Dashboard. Having responsive behaviour, smooth touch UI with API Integration. This project is for Artistic Content.

technokraft.title: TechnoKraft
technokraft.description: A fully Functional Next.js Based Frontend along with MERN Dashboard. Having responsive behaviour, smooth touch UI with API Integration. This project is for Educational Content Provider

bestGst.title: BEST GST Course
bestGst.description: A fully Functional Next.js Based Frontend along with MERN Dashboard. Having responsive behaviour, smooth touch UI with API Integration. This project also contains Payment Gateway Integration using Easebuzz. This is a GST Course Selling website.

affinix.title: Affinix Digital
affinix.description: A fully Functional Next.js Based Frontend along with MERN Dashboard. Having responsive behaviour, smooth touch UI with API Integration. This project is for Best Digital Marketing Agency

octaneApps.title: Octane Apps
octaneApps.description: A fully Functional Next.js Based Frontend along with MERN Dashboard. Having responsive behaviour, smooth touch UI with API Integration.

yogaInstitute.title: Dr. Manisha's Yoga Institute
yogaInstitute.description: Created a MEVN Stack Web Application. Gave more than 180+ hours on this project. The project also includes admin panel along with CRUD Functionalities. Blogging System using Firebase.

anandlok.title: Anandlok Ayurveda
anandlok.description: Using ReactJs, Next.js, and Material-UI, I worked as an Intern for Anandlok Ayurveda & Panchakrma Hospital and created a website for Ayurveda & Panchakarma practitioners to share their knowledge and experience with others.

newspedia.title: News-o-Pedia
newspedia.description: Using Vue.js I have created this news application having the main feature of Image Mapping, Used newsapi.org api to fetch the news from different parts of the world. Note: The API used works developers mode (i.e, locally. download it).

textToSpeech.title: Select Text to Speech Chrome extension
textToSpeech.description: A simple chrome extension where you can select text, then right click and then select the option 'Read aloud' and you can hear the final audio.

restro.title: Restro - A Restaurant Website
restro.description: A simple and beautiful Restaurant Website made with Pure HTML, CSS and JS. With some beautiful Animation and data fetching using API.

chakraUI.title: OpenSource Contribution in Chakra-UI
chakraUI.description: I created a portfolio website for my OpenSource contribution in Chakra-UI. This website is a collection of my contributions to the Chakra-UI community.

youtubeClone.title: YouTube Clone using ReactJs
youtubeClone.description: I created a YouTube clone using ReactJs and Material UI. Used Rapid API to fetch data and learnt how to fetch data using API. The API used here was YouTube v3.

blogging.title: Blogging Website
blogging.description: This Blogging Website is made with NodeJs, Express and MongoDB. It is a simple blogging website where you can read, write, delete and edit your blog post.

portfolio1.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio1.description: This is my personal portfolio website. I have made this with the help of NextJS + Its documents .You can see my projects, skills, and contact me over here as well.

spaceTalks.title: Space Talks ✨
spaceTalks.description: This is a MERN Website. I have created this website using ReactJs, Material-UI, Nodejs, CSS, Express and MongoDB. This website is a platform for people to share their love and knowledge about space, universe, stars, galaxies and other planets with people from all over.

portfolio2.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio2.description: This is My 1st Portfolio Website. I Made this with ReactJS while Learning ReactJS. A lots of CSS is Used for Animation. I have also added the feature of Dark & Light Mode

movieApp.title: Movie WebApp
movieApp.description: A Simple Movie App Using Pure ReactJs - made for just revision purpose

reactWebsite.title: Complete React Website
reactWebsite.description: I made this whole website from scratch with latest versions of React. This Complete Demo Website is Made using ReactJs, HTML, CSS. This website is a complete demo website which includes all the components of ReactJs.

wedding.title: Wedding Invitation Website
wedding.description: This Website is purely made with HTML, CSS and mainly JS. You Will find some Beautiful animations in this website. Some Special Features are also added in this website, please visit and check.

contact.heading: 取得联系
contact.introExpectations: 我与需要生产级代码和清晰沟通的产品团队和创始人合作。下面几项信息有助于我更有针对性地回复 - 目标、时间线和范围很重要。
contact.openToRoles: 接受全职、自由职业与合同 - 远程或现场均可。
contact.name: 您的姓名
contact.budgetLabel: 预算范围（便于对齐预期）
contact.timelinePlaceholder: 例如：尽快、2 周、1 个月
contact.projectDescriptionPlaceholder: 目标、时间线、范围以及如何衡量成功（简要说明即可）。
contact.success: 感谢 - 若需求匹配，我通常会在 24–48 小时内回复。
contact.trustMicrocopy: 不会发送垃圾信息。您的信息将严格保密。

faq.heading: 常见问题
faq.subheading: 获取有关我的服务和专业知识的常见问题答案

services.question: 您提供哪些服务？
services.answer: 我提供全栈 Web 开发服务，包括 React.js、Next.js、Node.js 和 MERN/MEVN 堆栈开发。我专门使用现代 Web 技术创建交互式和美观的用户界面。

experience.question: 您有多少经验？
experience.answer: 我在 Web 开发方面拥有 4 年以上的实际经验，使用包括 React.js、Next.js、Node.js、MongoDB、Express.js 和 Vue.js 在内的各种技术。

rate.question: 您的小时费率是多少？
rate.answer: 我的自由职业费率是每小时 25-57 美元，但这可能会根据项目范围和需求而有所不同。我在工作时间、小时费率、固定费率、付款条件方面很灵活，可用于短期和长期项目。

remote.question: 您远程工作吗？
remote.answer: 是的，我远程工作，并且有与不同时区的团队合作的经验。我位于英国，可用于远程工作机会。

usClients.question: 您与美国客户合作吗？
usClients.answer: 是的。我与美国客户合作- - 初创公司、产品团队、代理商。远程工作，灵活安排以配合美国时区，英语沟通，以美元计费。请通过表单或邮件联系。

technologies.question: 您专长于哪些技术？
technologies.answer: 我专长于 React.js、Next.js、Node.js、TypeScript、JavaScript、MERN/MEVN 堆栈、Tailwind CSS、ShadCN UI、MongoDB、Express.js、Vue.js 以及各种其他现代 Web 技术。

existing.question: 您能帮助现有项目吗？
existing.answer: 当然！我可以帮助维护、更新和增强现有的 Web 应用程序。我有使用遗留代码库的经验，可以帮助现代化较旧的应用程序。

hire.question: 如何雇佣您？
hire.answer: 在联系表中填写项目详情、时间表和预算。我通常在24–48小时内回复。我们可以安排通话讨论需求，然后开始。可灵活安排短期和长期项目。

experience.heading: My Experience
experience.content: Professional experience that I have accumulated over several years.

itTutor.title: IT Tutor
itTutor.description: I teach Scratch, Java, JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, Motion Design, AI, ML, and more. I help students learn these skills and build their own projects. I teach from age 5 to 40+

fullStackDragon.title: Full Stack Developer
fullStackDragon.description: Worked as a Full Stack developer at Dragon Sino Group, a Chinese company operating in the United Kingdom. Created fully functional MERN Stack Web Applications with responsive behavior, smooth touch UI, and API Integration.

frontendOctane.title: Frontend Developer (React.js)
frontendOctane.description: Worked as a Frontend Developer specializing in React.js at Octane Apps. Created fully functional Next.js based frontends with MERN dashboards, focusing on responsive design and smooth user interfaces.

frontendAnandlok.title: Frontend Developer (Full-Stack - Next.js)
frontendAnandlok.description: Worked as a Full Stack Developer Frontend Focused, creating a website for Ayurveda & Panchakarma practitioners using React.js, Next.js, and Material-UI. The platform allows practitioners to share their knowledge and experience with others.

vueDeveloper.title: Full Stack Vue.js Developer
vueDeveloper.description: Created a comprehensive MEVN Stack Web Application for Dr. Manisha's Yoga Institute, investing over 180+ hours in development. The project includes an admin panel with CRUD functionalities and a blogging system using Firebase. The platform serves as a digital space for yoga practitioners and students.

freelance.title: Freelance Full Stack Developer
freelance.description: Working as a freelance Full Stack Developer, specializing in MERN/MEVN stack development. Creating responsive web applications, e-commerce platforms, and custom solutions for various clients. Available for hire at $35/hr, may vary depending on the project. And flexible working hours.

testimonials.heading: Testimonials
testimonials.content: What clients and colleagues say about my work

lucca.name: Lucca Allen
lucca.content: I have worked with Yash, throughout two separate projects during which he was part of the ToraTech AI team. Yash has always shown tremendous initiative to get work done and work around problems. I was impressed with his back end skills, aswell as having a great eye for a UX and UI. I would recommend Yash to any company looking for efficient development.

daniela.name: Daniela Vélez
daniela.position: Global Marketing Director @ Dragon Sino Group
daniela.content: I had the opportunity to work with Yash and was pleased to see his enthusiasm from the very start. He approached his tasks with a positive attitude and showed a clear willingness to learn. Throughout our time working together, he was receptive to feedback and made efforts to improve. His openness to guidance was a valuable part of the collaboration.

cristina.name: Cristina
cristina.content: Yash has been an exceptional member of our teaching team at Impact A&C Leicester. He demonstrates a strong understanding of coding concepts and effectively adapts his teaching approach to suit students of all ages, from young beginners aged 5 to 17, to adults looking to advance their programming skills. He is intelligent, resourceful, and handles challenges with professionalism and composure. Whenever an issue or error arises, Yash manages to resolve it quickly and efficiently, ensuring the smooth flow of each session. He is also highly cooperative within the class environment, maintaining great communication with students and colleagues alike. His dedication, technical expertise, and calm attitude make him a valuable asset to our academy.

ranjeet.name: Ranjeet Ahire
ranjeet.content: I had the pleasure of managing Yash at Octane Apps, where he demonstrated exceptional skills and remarkable eagerness to learn. His technical proficiency in React and web development consistently exceeded expectations. Yash's problem-solving abilities were top-notch, and he tackled complex challenges with strategic thinking and innovative solutions. I highly recommend Yash for any role demanding technical expertise and creativity.

viraj.name: Dr. Viraj Gite
viraj.content: Yash put in tremendous effort as an intern at Anandlok Ayurveda and created an impressive website single-handedly using the appropriate technology stack. His dedication and technical skills were outstanding. We wish Yash the best of luck in his future endeavors.

manisha.name: Dr. Manisha Sonawane
manisha.content: Thank you Mr. Yash Kapure. I really appreciate your work on our website. The website looks professional and user-friendly. It's very easy to navigate our services and products to our clients. Our clients had a very positive impact. I highly recommend Yash for web development projects.

surekha.name: Surekha
surekha.content: Mr. Yash delivered our website to a truly professional standard - polished, modern, and built with up-to-date technology. What stood out was his enthusiasm and positive attitude throughout the project; we felt we were in safe, capable hands. It's rare to find someone so committed and trustworthy. We wish him every success in bringing the same reliable service to more clients.
